subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The Czech Republic claimed its third Fed Cup title in four years after the Wimbledon champion Petra Kvitova defeated Angelique Kerber of Germany, 7-6 (5), 4-6, 6-4, in Prague on Sunday.
snippet: The Czech Republic claimed its third Fed Cup title in four years after the Wimbledon champion Petra Kvitova defeated Angelique Kerber of Germany, 7-6 (5), 4-6, 6-4, in Prague on Sunday.
